mean_en: to press or squeeze something together or into a smaller space; to be pressed or squeezed in this way; to reduce something and fit it into a smaller space or amount of time; to make computer files, etc. smaller so that they use less space on a disk, etc.
sentence: The bags are much smaller after being compressed.
sentence_trans: 装被子的袋子在压缩后变小了很多。
word_etyma: com共同 + press压 → 一起压 → compress压缩
